answerText: gastroenteritis (prompt on "gastritis" or "enteritis")[10] Gastroenteritis is most commonly caused by this viral genus in the family Reoviridae. that is the most common cause of diarrhea in small children.

question: Question:  [10] Name this condition which sees both the stomach and small intestine become inflamed, resulting in diarrhea and vomiting.
